dc_title_s: Oil and gas pipe lines in Ohio, 1973
dc_description_s: Scale approximately 1:510,000.|"This map is a revision of the 1968 publication ..."|Includes directory of oil pipe line companies and index to gas pipe line companies.|"Ohio coordinate system 100,000-foot grid lines from U.S. Coast and Geodetic Survey data."|Shows gas and liquid petroleum storage areas, points of distribution, compressor stations, refineries, pumping stations, propane plants, and major control points.|Compiled by Harold J. Flint. Cartographic drafting by James E. Hairston.|"Base map by United States Dept. of the Interior, Geological Survey."
